name: password-pusher
description: Password Pusher is a self-hosted tool for sharing sensitive information via unique links that expire after viewing. It helps share passwords safely without sending them directly.
features: Expiring links: Generate unique URLs that automatically expire after set number of views or time period for secure sharing
One-time viewing: Links can be configured to self-destruct after first view, ensuring passwords are only seen once
Password protection: Add additional password requirement to links for extra security when sharing sensitive credentials
View tracking: Monitor when and how many times a link has been accessed to verify delivery and detect unauthorized access
Custom expiration: Set flexible expiration rules based on time duration, view count, or specific date for granular control
File sharing: Share files securely with the same expiring link mechanism, not just passwords and text
No registration: Create and share links without account creation for quick, frictionless secure sharing
Audit trail: Track creation and access history for shared secrets to maintain security compliance and accountability
API access: Programmatic link creation via API enables integration with automation tools and custom workflows
